content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the ad-free large print pdf the jasmine scarf is a cross between the classic infinity scarf and the popular triangle scarf you can wear this scarf with a dress or with jeans and it will still look fabulous the stitches you need to know for this pattern are the single_crochet double_crochet and cluster stitch there are written instructions for the cluster stitch included in the pattern as well as line by line instructions and stitch counts for every round of the pattern there is also a stitch chart for the increase section of the pattern if you prefer to work with a chart the chart and some extra close up photos of the stitches are placed at the end of the pattern so that you have the option to not print them out this pattern calls for a size 4 medium weight yarn and an i/9 5 5 mm hook
